roleset.name: to lose courage to do something

role.descr: task that arg0 fails to do

example.name: No task specified
example.text: This is the World Series and I'm not gon na wimp out!

example.name: All args
example.text: My pal Jan and I had wimped out of re-arranging our internal organs by going on the Oblivion ride.
example.arg: of re-arranging our internal organs by going on the Oblivion ride.

roleset.note: WIMP-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to chicken.01 (chicken out). (from wimp.01-v)
